Thanks for attending the recent RIS/NCR webinar, “Get More Customers in the Door and More Orders Going Out Your C-store.”
You learned important factors to consider when you think about adding foodservice and/or self-service in your store.
Now it’s time to act. At NCR, we’re winning with the leading foodservice and #1 self-checkout solutions in the industry. And we’re ready to help you win, too.
To explore which NCR options are a great fit for you, contact us <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/thank-you?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2020_07_DecodingGrocery_Campaign_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=Grocery_&_Mass_Merchants]]> and we’ll give you a call back to answer your questions.
No risk, no hard sell—just information.
Missed the webinar or want to hear it again? Register or login to listen on demand <[[https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1403942&tp_key=0f46af1ce5&sti=email&utm_source=omeda&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=WEBINAR_RISNews&utm_keyword=]]>.
